Title: Antardwand
Writer: Sushil Rajpal (story), Amitabh Verma (dialogue), Amitabh Verma (screenplay)
Actors: Raj Singh Chaudhary, Swati Sen, Akhilendra Mishra, Vinay Pathak
Plot: A young man is kidnapped by a local strongman with the intention of forcing him to marry his daughter to secure a family alliance.
